Package org.springframework.cache.jcache

Implementation package for JSR-107 (javax.cache aka "JCache") based caches.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JCacheCache
    Cache implementation on top of a Cache instance.
    JCacheCacheManager
    CacheManager implementation backed by a JCache CacheManager.
    JCacheManagerFactoryBean
    FactoryBean for a JCache CacheManager, obtaining a pre-defined CacheManager by name through the standard JCache Caching class.

Package org.springframework.cache.jcache Description

Implementation package for JSR-107 (javax.cache aka "JCache") based caches. Provides a CacheManager and Cache implementation for use in a Spring context, using a JSR-107 compliant cache provider.
